Chapter 3 Webex Use the following code to install webex: devtools::install_github("psyteachr/webex") The webex package is called in the setup chunk, so you don't need to call it on every page you want to use webex. If you're using webex outside of this bookdown template, such as in an rmarkdown webpage, you will need to set the output type to webex::webex_default in the yaml header in order to import the css and javascript files.
